```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
x=iris
names(x)=paste('v',1:5,sep="")
x %<>% tbl_df()
x
subset(x = x,select = c(v1),subset = v1>7)
filter(x,v1>5,v1<6)
arrange(x,v1,v2)
select(x,v1)

kk=x %.%
  group_by(v5) %.%
  summarise(total=sum(v1),ss=sum(v2),n=n()) %.%
  arrange(total)
is(kk)
kk %>%
  filter(total>260) %>%
  select(v5)
kk %>%
  summarise(sum(total))


cc=x %>%
    mutate(v6=v2+v3) %>%
    select(v1,v5,v6)
cc

```
